#!/bin/ksh
VERSION=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/ops-dt/webapps/ops-dt/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"`
print Gathering build version to be deployed print -------------------------------------- print print Deploying version ${VERSION} print print print print Beginning Rebuild from scratch for app/db to latest package version ${VERSION} print ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh dvappdai04 ops-dt stop
cd /opt/build/scripts ./kill_dbsessions.sh -a ops-dt -e scrum3
cd /opt/checkouts/ops-dt/grails-app/migrations/cisys echo "@genUser.scrum3.sql;" | sqlplus -s 'cm_system/oracle123@(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS_LIST=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=10.13.18.121)(PORT=1522)))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVICE_NAME=scrum003)))'
cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts
./deployRebuildDb.sh -a ops-dt -t ops-dt -i ops-dt -r ${VERSION} -e scrum3 -j "jdbc:oracle:thin:@10.13.18.121:1522:scrum003" -p SC3_OPS_DT -u SC3_OPS_DT -v
